text.p: Galtech Semiconductor Materials Corp on Tuesday said it completed a private placement of stock with investors including M.H. Meyerson & Co Inc, which should help lead it to profitablity.
The new funds will enable Galtech to acquire strategic production equipment, marking its semiconductor materials division's emergence from development stages to production.

"For the balance of 1997 we anticipate making significant market penetration with our Cadmium Telluride product and are expecting profitability by the end of the third quarter," Chief Executive Officer Russell Chapman said in a statement.
